headline: Jefferies Remains Bullish on NVIDIA Corporation (NVDA)
summary: NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) is one of the best stocks to buy in 2026 for beginners. On January 16, Jefferies lifted the price target on NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) to $275 from $250 and reiterated a Buy rating, telling investors that the stock “remains pretty cheap”, trading at mid-teens multiple to its bottom-up implied calendar year 2027 […]
